devdoc.author: Radiant Labs
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

lastEligibleTime(address).details: If user is still eligible, it will return future time  CAUTION: this function only works perfect when the array  is ordered by lock time. This is assured when _stake happens.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Eligible Deposit Provider

DqTimeUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when DQ time is set

LPTokenUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when LP token is set

PriceToleranceRatioUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when price tolerance ratio is updated

RequiredDepositRatioUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when required TVL ratio is updated

getDqTime(address).notice: Returns DQ time of the user

isEligibleForRewards(address).notice: Returns if the user is eligible to receive rewards

isMarketDisqualified(address).notice: Is user DQed due to lock expire or price update

lastEligibleStatus(address).notice: Last eligible status of the user

lastEligibleTime(address).notice: Returns last eligible time of the user

lockedUsdValue(address).notice: Returns locked RDNT and LP token value in eth

priceToleranceRatio().notice: Ratio of the required price to still allow without disqualification; in bips

requiredDepositRatio().notice: Required ratio of TVL to get reward; in bips

requiredUsdValue(address).notice: Returns USD value required to be locked

setDqTime(address,uint256).notice: Sets DQ time of the user

setPriceToleranceRatio(uint256).notice: Sets price tolerance ratio. Can only be called by the owner.

setRequiredDepositRatio(uint256).notice: Sets required tvl ratio. Can only be called by the owner.

userDeposits(address,address).notice: User's deposits per rToken; rToken => user => amount
